pullRequest.title: Add dummy javadocs to client parameters & builder ctor

commit.message: Add dummy javadocs to client parameters & builder ctor
Merge branch 'v4' of github.com:Azure/autorest.java into missing-javadoc
Use new parameter doc gen logic

nodes.bodyText: The original logic prioritizes the parameter schema's description over the parameter's own description. I feel like it should be the other way around
Agree that the parameter's description should take precedence.
